tool_description: This API provide data of cities in the world.
title: City in the world

api_list.name: Get City by ISO
api_list.description: This endpoint will give you information about city that you can filter by ISO

api_list.name: Get City by Country
api_list.description: This endpoint will give you information about city with filter by country of city

api_list.name: Get City By Name
api_list.description: This endpoint will give you information about city with filter by name of city

api_list.name: Get All Cities
api_list.description: This endpoint will give you about all cities  data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://city-in-the-world.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-in-the-world.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
